verses.name: Matthew 5:9
verses.text: Blessed are the peacemakers: for they shall be called the children of God.

verses.name: Matthew 5:10
verses.text: Blessed are they which are persecuted for righteousness’ sake: for theirs is the kingdom of heaven.

verses.name: Matthew 5:11
verses.text: Blessed are ye, when men shall revile you, and persecute you, and shall say all manner of evil against you falsely, for my sake.

verses.name: Matthew 5:12
verses.text: Rejoice, and be exceeding glad: for great is your reward in heaven: for so persecuted they the prophets which were before you.
